name: BEAT.R.
description:
3D blocks exploding everywhere while colors and sounds delight you in every way. This infinite runner is sure to grab your attention for at least 30 seconds.

Play through an endless procedurally generated runner that increases in difficulty over time. Grab blocks to score more points, or focus on surviving! The longer you play, the higher the level of difficulty. The higher the level, the greater the score! Think you've mastered the game? Try on hard mode for an even greater challenge!
